member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.ILineNumberResolver
member.summary: An interface used for resolving line numbers in a document.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.ILineNumberResolver.ResolveLineNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Find the line number of a path.
member.param: The path describing the location in the document.
member.returns: The line number of the specified path.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonLineNumberResolver
member.summary: An used for resolving line numbers from an expanded JSON template to the original JSON template.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonLineNumberResolver.#ctor(Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.TemplateContext)
member.summary: Create a new instance with the given .
member.param: The template context to map JSON paths against.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonLineNumberResolver.ResolveLineNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Given a JSON path in an expanded JSON template, find the equivalent line number in the original JSON template.
member.param: The path in the expanded template to find the line number of in the original template.
member.returns: The line number of the equivalent location in the original template, or 1 if it can't be determined.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonPathResolver
member.summary: An IJsonPathResolver to resolve JSON paths.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonPathResolver.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of JsonPathResolver, used to resolve Json paths from a JToken.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonPathResolver.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the JToken(s) at the specified path from the current scope.
member.returns: The JToken(s) at the path. If the path does not exist, returns a JToken with a null value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JsonPathResolver.ResolveResourceType(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the JTokens for resources of the specified type in a "resources" property array at the current scope.
member.param: The type of resource to find.
member.returns: An enumerable of resolvers with a scope of a resource of the specified type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions
member.summary: This class is used to simplify accessing values in JTokens.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokenContext
member.summary: Helper class for InsensitiveTokens() method. Instances of this class are added to a queue, and as items are dequeued, the next element in the path is searched for in the context of the item.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokenContext.Token
member.summary: The current token found in this context.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokenContext.ResolvedPath
member.summary: The path segments resolved so far up to .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokenContext.NextPathIndex
member.summary: The next index of the path segments to look for. (The path segments are looked up in .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveToken(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.String)
member.summary: Finds a child JToken with the specified property name or JSON path. If a path is passed, each child in the path must be separated by '.'. JArray integer indexing is also supported.
member.param: The property name or JSON path to search for
member.returns: The named property, or the JToken at the end of the path, or null if not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveToken(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.InsensitivePathNotFoundBehavior)
member.summary: Finds a child JToken with the specified property name or JSON path. If a path is passed, each child in the path must be separated by '.'. JArray integer indexing is also supported.
member.param: The property name or JSON path to search for.
Behavior if property or path is not fully resolved.
member.returns: The named property, or the JToken at the end of the path, if found. If not found, behavior is determined by .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokens(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.String)
member.summary: Finds child JTokens at the specified JSON path. Each child in the path must be separated by '.'. To select all children under an element, use '*' as a wildcard. '*' must appear by itself with no other characters between the '.' characters in the path. JArray integer and '*' wildcard indexing are also supported.
member.param: The JSON path to search for.
member.returns: A JToken for each fully resolved property found for the requested path. Many tokens could be returned if wildcards are present in the path. If the path cannot be completely resolved, null will be returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokens(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.InsensitivePathNotFoundBehavior)
member.summary: Finds child JTokens at the specified JSON path. Each child in the path must be separated by '.'. To select all children under an element, use '*' as a wildcard. '*' must appear by itself with no other characters between the '.' characters in the path. JArray integer and '*' wildcard indexing are also supported.
member.param: The JSON path to search for.
Behavior if path is not fully resolved. If is specified, and the path contains wildcards, only JTokens which fully match the specified path are returned; all other path 'branches' are discarded.
member.returns: A JToken for each fully resolved property found for the requested path. Many tokens could be returned if wildcards are present in the path. If the path cannot be completely resolved, the JToken returned will be determined by . If there are no wildcards in the path, and is , and the path was not resolved, a single null is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.AddAllChildrenToQueue(System.Collections.Generic.Queue{Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokenContext},Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.JTokenExtensions.InsensitiveTokenContext)
member.summary: Helper method for InsensitiveTokens(). Adds all child properties of the token context to the queue to be processed later. For any child property which has a value of an array, all elements of the array are added to the queue.
Helper for InsensitiveTokens(). Adds all elements of a JArray to the queue to be processed later.
Helper for InsensitiveTokens(). Adds a new child JToken to the queue to be processed later.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.InsensitivePathNotFoundBehavior
member.summary: Used to control behavior of InsensitiveToken() extension when a property or path is not found.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.InsensitivePathNotFoundBehavior.Null
member.summary: Returns null if the property is not found, or JSON path is not fully resolved.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.InsensitivePathNotFoundBehavior.Error
member.summary: Throws an exception if the property is not found, or JSON path is not fully resolved.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.InsensitivePathNotFoundBehavior.LastValid
member.summary: If the property is not found, or JSON path is not fully resolved, returns a reference to the last valid JToken in the path.
